import React,{Fragment , useState} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; export const Login = () => { const [formDate,setFormData] = useState({ email:'', password:'', }); const {email,password} = formDate; const handleChange = e => setFormData({...formDate,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) //Save the values of inputs const submitDetails = async e => { e.preventDefault(); } return
